mapper.select: select sum(welfare_amount_salaries) welfare_amount_salaries, sum(welfare_amount_bonus) welfare_amount_bonus, sum(welfare_amount_weal) welfare_amount_weal from personnel_welfare where welfare_date = #{month}

select sum(welfare_amount_salaries) welfare_amount_salaries, sum(welfare_amount_bonus) welfare_amount_bonus, sum(welfare_amount_weal) welfare_amount_weal from personnel_welfare where welfare_date like concat(#{year},'-%')

SELECT WELFARE_DATE,COUNT(DISTINCT(WORKCODE)) RS, NVL(SUM(WELFARE_AMOUNT_SALARIES), 0)/10000 SSX, NVL(SUM(WELFARE_AMOUNT_BONUS), 0)/10000 JJ, NVL(SUM(WELFARE_AMOUNT_WEAL), 0)/10000 FL FROM PERSONNEL_WELFARE WHERE WELFARE_DATE LIKE CONCAT(#{year},'-%') GROUP BY WELFARE_DATE
